title: Haldi Soft Glam
description: Gajra Gang Lehenga Set: A vibrant and cheerful yellow, perfect for a Haldi ceremony. The tie-dye print is light and breezy, ideal for an outdoor daytime event.
Kundan Rani Haar Necklace Set: Traditional Kundan work with delicate pink accents, adding a touch of royalty and soft glam. It beautifully complements the yellow without overpowering the look.
Kundan Hathphool: A graceful traditional hand jewellery. It adds elegance without too much hassle.
Embellished Jutti: Classic, comfortable footwear with subtle embellishments, ensuring style and ease for long hours of celebration.
Soft Makeup: Dewy skin, flushed cheeks & pinkish-nude lips.
flatlayAlt: Flat lay of haldi soft glam
modelAlt: Model wearing the haldi soft glam outfit styled from the flat lay
